summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for acquisition by condemnation of such additional property rights in existing electric transmission line right of way in Section 12, township 23 North, Range 4 East; Section 19, Township 23 North, Range 5 East, W.M., and the plat of Scenic Ridge Heights as are necessary to permit the installation of additional conductors and the substitution of steel poles and appurtenances for the existing lattice-type steel tower system, and for payment therefor.
